company

Class Department

  • java.lang.Object
    • company.Department
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Department
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A department of the company. All the staff members of the company belongs to exactly one department. A department is composed of employees and managers. There should always be one head manager in every department. A department must be created from inside the company.
    Author:
    Charles MECHERIKI
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • assignHeadManager

        public void assignHeadManager(Manager _manager)
                       throws CompanyStructureException
        Assigns the given manager as head manager of the department. Note : a manager assigned with this method will be set as one of the managers AND the new head manager of the department.
        Parameters:
        _manager - the manager to assign
        Throws:
        CompanyStructureException - if the manager is already head manager of the department

      • getManagers

      • containsManager

        public boolean containsManager(Manager _manager)
        Returns true if the department contains the manager, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        _manager - the manager to look for
        Returns:
        true if the department contains the manager, false otherwise

      • assignManager

        public void assignManager(Manager _manager)
                   throws CompanyStructureException
        Assigns the given manager the department. Note : a manager assigned with this method will be ONLY set as one of the managers of the department.
        Parameters:
        _manager - the manager to assign
        Throws:
        CompanyStructureException - if the manager is already managing any department

      • dismissManager

        public void dismissManager(Manager _manager)
                    throws CompanyStructureException
        Dismisses the manager from the department.
        Parameters:
        _manager - the manager to dismiss
        Throws:
        CompanyStructureException - if the manager is currently head of the department or isn't in the department
